research experience.name: University of Minnesota
research experience.summary: My work focuses on the human gut microbiome. I've collaborated to generate the largest publicly available dataset of uniformly processed human gut microbiome data, available at MicroBioMap.org.

publications.name: Integration of 168,000 samples reveals global patterns of the human gut microbiome
publications.summary: To better understand broad patterns in microbiome variation, we uniformly processed over 168,000 publicly available human gut microbiome samples, integrating them into a single dataset. This dataset revealed geographic patterns in microbiome composition.
